meanings.definition: To remove from a selected list or group.
meanings.sent1: She quickly deselects the wrong answer.
meanings.sent2: He always deselects the items he no longer needs.
meanings.sent3: The computer accidentally deselects all the files!
meanings.sent4: His absence deselects him from the team like a missing puzzle piece.
meanings.sent5: The delete button deselects with a satisfying click.

meanings.definition: To choose not to select or include.
meanings.sent1: They often deselect the most expensive option.
meanings.sent2: I usually deselect the dessert to save money.
meanings.sent3: She will deselect the noisy movie for a quiet night in.
meanings.sent4: His unique style deselects him from the usual crowd.
meanings.sent5: The wise leader deselects unnecessary risks for the team's safety.
